title: Libra

nouns: Seventh astrological sign in the zodiac
Libra is the seventh astrological sign in the Zodiac.
An astrological sign based on the star constellation
Someone with a Libra star sign.
Someone with a Libra star sign
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
A small faint zodiacal constellation in the southern hemisphere; between Virgo and Scorpius
A star constellation in the sky
Libra is a constellation of the zodiac.

description: The Libra astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents weighing scales.
apple_vendor_description: The Libra emoji on Apple devices is a beautifully rendered representation of the zodiac sign, depicted with a golden, metallic sheen. Its scales are perfectly balanced, showcasing Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting that gives it a polished, three-dimensional feel. This emoji, with its soft, rounded edges, embodies harmony, balance, and fairness, often used to signify diplomacy or a need for equilibrium in digital conversations.
